channel.title: The Home Computer of 2004?
channel.description: Got forwarded this today, apparently from a 1954 Popular Mechanics magazine. "...how a 'home computer' could look like in the year 2004. With teletype interface and the Fortran language, the computer will be easy to use." I thought that the...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Phil+00:00
item.description: Why that looks a bit like my office at home. I must admit, I don't have the posh ceiling mounted monitor just yet!
item.dc:creator: Phil

item.title: Comment by Ben+00:00
item.description: Except you can see all the mis-matched perspectives in the photoshopped picture - but probably just because I'm looking for it! :-)
item.dc:creator: Ben
